text: vAqyura#si prAqNO nAma# saviqturAdhi#patyE&pAqnaM mE# dAqScakShu#rasiq SrOtraqM nAma# dhAqturAdhi#patyaq Ayu#rmE dA rUqpama#siq varNOq nAmaq bRuhaqspatEqrAdhi#patyE praqjAM mE# dA Ruqtama#si saqtyaM nAmEndraqsyA&&*dhi#patyE kShaqtraM mE# dA BUqtama#siq BavyaqM nAma# pitRuqNAmAdhi#patyEq&pA-mOSha#dhInAqM garBa#M dhA Ruqtasya# tvAq vyO#mana Ruqtasya# - [  ]   11
